articles.title: This butterfly-shaped solar power space station could provide electricity to future Moon settlements - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: The study envisions that this concept has the potential to provide a consistent supply of 23 megawatts of electricity, supporting a range of lunar operations.
articles.content: Theoretically, this station may deliver "megawatts of microwave power" to solar panel receivers on the lunar surface. The study envisages that this concept could supply constant 23 megawatts of elect… [+1283 chars]
